subject: Question about JUnit 4 execution
msgSnippet: Hi, I m new to JUnit 4 testing and I have a question about its execution. If I have one simple test class like this: public class Test { public static MyClass
messageBody:
Hi,

I'm new to JUnit 4 testing and I have a question about its execution.
If I have one simple test class like this:

public class Test {

public static MyClass ins;

public MyOtherClass oth;

@BeforeClass
public static void beforeAllMethod() {
// if I initialize "ins" static object here
ins = new MyClass();

// Is this "ins" object available in all @Test methods in the
class ?

}

@Before
public void before() {
// If I instantinate "oth" object here
oth = new MyOtherClass();

}

@After
public void after() {

}

@Test
public void testMethod() {
// I work here with my objects;
ins.someMethod();
oth.someMethod();
}
}

My question is related to the static "ins" object, is this object
unique to this Class and its @Test methods during JUnit test of this
test class ?
